dashboard.title: RuoYi Management Framework
dashboard.description: RuoYi is a comprehensive background management system that can be used for all Web applications such as website backend, member center, CMS, CRM, OA, etc. Of course, you can also customize it for more powerful systems. All front-end and back-end code is very concise and easy to use after encapsulation, with low error probability. It also supports mobile client access. The system will continue to update some practical functions.
dashboard.donateText: You can buy the author a coffee to show your encouragement

401.title: You don't have permission to access this page

404.title: Page Not Found
404.subtitle: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist. Try checking the URL for errors, then press the refresh button on your browser or try to find something else in our application.
